kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.msg: Typing text 'CS KKU' into text field 'id:organization'.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id:errors' contains exact text 'Please enter your name!!'.
The text of element 'id:errors' should have been 'Please enter your name!!' but it was '*Please enter your name!!'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.status: The text of element 'id:errors' should have been 'Please enter your name!!' but it was '*Please enter your name!!'.
